product_description: Chemical Guys C4 & P4 Clear Cut Correction Compound and Precision Paint Perfection Polish Combo (GAP40016) delivers a complete 2-step paint correction system for restoring and perfecting automotive finishes. C4 Clear Cut Correction Compound is engineered for maximum cutting power, removing deep scratches, heavy swirl marks, oxidation, towel marks, and acid rain etching. Its advanced abrasives level paint quickly and effectively, preparing the surface for polishing while minimizing dust and residue. P4 Precision Paint Perfection Polish is the refining step that enhances depth, gloss, and color clarity. It removes micro-marring, holograms, and light haze left behind from compounding, leaving behind a mirror-like, show-quality finish. This Chemical Guys C4 and P4 polish kit is safe for use on clear coat, single-stage, and ceramic-coated vehicles, both products are compatible with dual action and rotary polishers or hand application. Whether you’re restoring neglected paint or maintaining a garage-kept show car, the C4 & P4 car polish kit gives you professional-level correction and shine in an easy-to-use package. This bundle is great for DIY car owners to use to improve vehicle appearance, for removing scratches on automotive paint, and for paint restoration.
